Conversation

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • Conversation.Topic

  • public class Topic
extends java.lang.Object
    This defines an individual "topic" of conversation. Each topic has a title and corresponding statements associated with it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Topic> relatedTopics
      The topics that can be accessed from any of statements under this topic.
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Statement> statements
      The statements under the topic.
      protected java.lang.String title
      The title of the topic.
